product_name: Electra Townie Original Bike Tire - 26 x 2
long_description: Made for cruising, the 26 in. Electra Townie Original bike tire features a semi-slick tread for smooth-rolling on pavement and waterfront paths. Great for your cruiser bike, the 26 in. tire offers a stable contact patch with a semi-slick tread that's smooth in the middle and grippy along the edges.
short_description: Made for cruising, the 26 in. Electra Townie Original bike tire features a semi-slick tread for smooth-rolling on pavement and waterfront paths.
